title: Sponsor Shock: Rabobank Returns to Partner Visma-Lease a Bike
content:
Dutch mega-bank will take a space of the Visma jersey from the Tour de France onward, 12 years after exiting cycling in the grizzly fallout of the EPO era.

Read the full article at Sponsor Shock: Rabobank Returns to Partner Visma-Lease a Bike on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
